website_summaries.verdict: A capable machine with an impressive list of accessories for numerous tanning sessions and great results.
pros: Customers rave about the long-lasting results and user-friendly machine
Comes with a generous accessory kit that includes a cleanser, five tanning solutions in different shades, and hair and feet protectors
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum
The spray tent is a nice bonus, but it's not very durable

customer_reviews.title: Great Spray TANtastic.
customer_reviews.text: I was spending 40 plus every week for my daughter and then decided to buy this machine. It’s great no problems and very user friendly and she looked great on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it sprays great; sometimes it sprays awful. The adjustments Have to be made EVERY spray. It doesn’t stay “set”
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I use it to spray tan myself and it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Professional spray tan in your own home
customer_reviews.text: My Wife lovess this product! She has becomes obsessed with spray tanning in the basement. Also, I’m not going to lie I don’t mind spraying her naked body and my spray tanning skills are on point!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Laudenslager

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Using for at home spray tanning and the machine was easy to set up use and clean. I watched a quick you tube video by the manufacturer and was spraying in no time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Gholston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tan...no sun needed😊
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the easy use of this tanning system. Well made. Need to use a gentle touch on trigger though, can come out too heavy. Wish there was a detailed catalog of products to go with it also. Feel confident with purchasing this kit.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so easy to use I use it on myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Mischea

customer_reviews.title: Spray tan solution color and drying time
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine and accessories. Don’t like the Sjolie solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kris & Andi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product/item
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever!!! Cancelled my monthly subscription to tanning salon (Ultra Tan). It’s the same as salon, except you’re in the comfort of your home & can tan anytime of the day or night. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: christine o'connor

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate Spray Tent
customer_reviews.text: The spray tent is not of good quality. We always store the tent inside and take really good care of it to include cleaning. I reached out to whom I placed the order with and was denied a replacement due to them claiming it to be “normal.” Also they stated that they only have a 30 day warranty on the tent which via this add I didn’t see anything about that. The tent is separating right at the weld that holds 2 pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W.

customer_reviews.title: sprays awful!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is my second machine bc the hose to my first one cracked and it was $70 dollars for a new hose so I figured I’d just get a new machine. Went with this one and the mist comes out SO THICK and bleeds down my skin. It doesn’t matter how I adjust the setting and I’m spraying from a good distance away from my body. For some reason it won’t come out right. So I used the hose from this machine on my maxi mist light - go w the maxi mist light .
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best spray tan kit on the market!
customer_reviews.text: amazing spray tan solution line with a great quality spray tan machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I spray tan people for a living and I dreaded always cleaning my metal (and three times as expensive) gun every night. Once adjusted, this gun gives a flawless spray and is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Allure Spray Tanning Machine System with Sjolie Natural Airbrush Tan Solution and Sunless Pro Kit - Black Tent
product_meta.description:
* Kit Contains:
 * Aura Allure Spray Tan Machine
 * Sjolie Spray Tan Solution No 9 - Medium Blend - 4 oz
 * Sjolie Spray Tan Solution No 12 - Dark Blend - 4 oz
 * Sjolie Ultra One – Rapid Spray Tan Solution - 4 oz
 * Sjolie ICON Reserve: Tier One Spray Tan Solution (Fast Dry) - 4 oz
 * Sjolie ICON Reserve: Tier Two Spray Tan Solution (Fast Dry) - 4 oz
 * Sjolie Barrier Cream - 16 oz
 * Sjolie pH Balancer - 8oz
 * Sjolie Gun Cleaner - 16oz
 * Disposable Hair Caps - 50 Pack
 * Disposable Stick On Feet Pad Spa Soles Tanning Sandals - 25 Pair Pink
 * Black Tanning Tent with Carry Bag

The Aura Allure Sprayer Includes:

 * Aura Allure Spray Tanning Turbine Unit
 * Allure Spray Gun with Satin Nozzle Technology
 * Flexible 11.5 foot hose
 * 2 Extra Cups w/Lids
 * Spare Parts Kit (Turbine Filter, Cup Gasket, Solution Pick Up Tube)
 * System manual

Allure Sprayer Features:

 * Satin Spray Nozzle Technology: Finest atomization for perfect coverage, a smooth feeling on the skin and low overspray.
 * Salon Design:Gloss black surfaces and metallic finishes give this machine a lavish feel of glamour, class and luxury.
 * Whisper Quiet Turbine.
 * Lightweight Turbine with Cable Store.
 * Retractable Carry Handle.
 * Gun Holder: Machine can be moved with the gun docked. No spillages, no need for extra hands. All in one storage solution.
 * Long Flexi Hose: 1.5ft Durable, extra soft, extra flex hose for increased manuverability. Twist & lock connection at gun.
 * Ingenious Filtration:Overspray is channeled behind the side panel and directed into the filter underneath.
feature_bullets: Aura Allure Spray Tanning Turbine Unit, Flexible 11.5 foot hose, 2 Extra Cups w/Lids, Spare Parts Kit
5 Sjolie Spray Tan Solutions: No 9 - Medium Blend - 4 oz, No 12 - Dark Blend - 4oz, Ultra One – Rapid - 4 oz, ICON Reserve: Tier One (Fast Dry) - 4oz, ICON Reserve: Tier Two (Fast Dry) - 4 oz
Sjolie Barrier Cream - 16oz, Sjolie pH Balance Spray - 8oz, Sjolie Gun Cleaner - 16oz
Disposable Hair Caps - 50 Pack, Disposable Stick On Feet Pad Spa Soles Tanning Sandals - 25 Pair Pink
Black Pop Up Spray Tanning Tent and carry Bag
